20101216180934.000|20101216180936.000|CCO|WORDS SORT OF CLEANED IT UP IN A

20101216180940.000|20101216180942.000|CCO|REPORT IS THAT IT'S BEEN AN 
20101216180942.000|20101216180945.333|CCO|UNEVEN RELATIONSHIP, AND THAT'S

20101216184555.333|20101216184558.667|CCO|>>> WELL, BEFORE THE BREAK, WE 
20101216184558.667|20101216184602.000|CCO|ASKED YOU HOW MANY TREES WORTH 
20101216184602.000|20101216184604.000|CCO|OF PAPER ARE THROWN AWAY IN THE 
20101216184604.000|20101216184606.000|CCO|UNITED STATES EVERY YEAR.
20101216184606.000|20101216184608.000|CCO|100 MILLION, 250 MILLION, 600 
20101216184608.000|20101216184610.000|CCO|MILLION OR A BILLION.
20101216184610.000|20101216184612.000|CCO|I AM SURPRISED AT THIS?
20101216184612.000|20101216184614.000|CCO|A BILLION TREES WORTH OF PAPER 
20101216184614.000|20101216184616.000|CCO|THROWN AWAY IN THE UNITED STATES
20101216184616.000|20101216184618.000|CCO|EVERY YEAR, BUT NEW TECHNOLOGY 
20101216184618.000|20101216184620.000|CCO|IS BEING USED IN THAILAND THAT 
20101216184620.000|20101216184622.000|CCO|COULD CHANGE THAT BY ALLOWING US
20101216184622.000|20101216184624.500|CCO|TO RECYCLE EVEN MORE PAPER 
20101216184624.500|20101216184627.000|CCO|PRODUCTS.
20101216184627.000|20101216184629.500|CCO|SOME YOORCHT TO GO IN THE TRASH 
20101216184629.500|20101216184632.000|CCO|BEHALF LAMINATED COATING.
20101216184632.000|20101216184634.500|CCO|USES A MODIFIED ENZYME, THEY CAN
20101216184634.500|20101216184637.000|CCO|BREAK IT DOWN TO SEPARATE THE 
20101216184637.000|20101216184639.500|CCO|PAPER AND PLASTER, AND BOTH CAN 
20101216184639.500|20101216184642.000|CCO|BE RECYCLED.
20101216184642.000|20101216184644.500|CCO|JOINING ME VIA SKYPE IS THE CEO 
20101216184644.500|20101216184647.000|CCO|OF FLEX OSEARCH.
20101216184647.000|20101216184649.500|CCO|THANKS FOR JOINING US PAJIP. 
20101216184649.500|20101216184652.000|CCO|>> HI, ALI. 
20101216184652.000|20101216184655.333|CCO|>> WE DIDN'T EVEN KNOW -- I 
20101216184655.333|20101216184658.667|CCO|WASN'T EVEN CLEAR THAT SOME OF 
20101216184658.667|20101216184702.000|CCO|THESE THINGS COULDN'T BE 
20101216184702.000|20101216184704.500|CCO|RECYCLED.
20101216184704.500|20101216184707.000|CCO|WHAT DOES THIS CHANGE?
20101216184707.000|20101216184709.500|CCO|>> HAD ELLO?
20101216184709.500|20101216184712.000|CCO|>> TELL ME ABOUT THE PROCESS.
20101216184712.000|20101216184717.000|CCO|>> OKAY.
20101216184717.000|20101216184722.000|CCO|>> WE COVER THE PAPER FROM THE 
20101216184722.000|20101216184724.000|CCO|LAMINATE, FOR EXAMPLE THE 
20101216184724.000|20101216184726.000|CCO|PLASTIC COATED LINING.
20101216184726.000|20101216184728.000|CCO|>> AND YOU SEPARATE THEM.

20101216184730.000|20101216184732.000|CCO|PLASTIC CAN BE RECYCLED?

20101216184734.500|20101216184737.000|CCO|BOTH PLASTIC AND PAPER CAN BE

20101216184739.500|20101216184742.000|CCO|THEN WE USE THE PAPER TO THE
